name: Glow Baseball Homerun: Win the Big Battle!
name_original: Glow Baseball Homerun: Win the Big Battle!
description:
Hit a home run with the simple flick of your finger!

Experience a real life baseball batting motion through various throws. How's your aim? Flick the ball directly head on and watch it soar through the sky for a home run!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
